entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow changing to periods of rain or snow before morning. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
